plot: A TV show uses the charisma of a child, Paulinho, to ask for monetary help to treat his alleged rare disease. By accident, the child dies, but the show manages to profit anyway.
title: Azul Caixão de Anjo
plot_es: A TV show uses the charisma of a child, Paulinho, to ask for monetary help to treat his alleged rare disease. By accident, the child dies, but the show manages to profit anyway.
plot_en: A TV show uses the charisma of a child, Paulinho, to ask for monetary help to treat his alleged rare disease. By accident, the child dies, but the show manages to profit anyway.
